00037 #include "CommandIllegal.hpp"
00038 
00039 #include <iostream>
00040 namespace RTT {
00041     using namespace scripting;
00042     using namespace std;
00043 
00044     CommandIllegal::CommandIllegal( const std::string& cmd )
00045             : illCmd( cmd ), description( "" )
00046     {}
00047 
00048     CommandIllegal::CommandIllegal( const std::string& cmd, const std::string& descr )
00049             : illCmd( cmd ), description( descr )
00050     {}
00051 
00052     bool CommandIllegal::execute()
00053     {
00054         cout << "Tried to execute an illegal command: " << endl;
00055         cout << illCmd << endl;
00056         cout << description << endl;
00057         return true;
00058     }
00059 
00060     void CommandIllegal::warn()
00061     {
00062         cout << "Tried to create an illegal command: " << endl;
00063         cout << illCmd << endl;
00064         cout << description << endl;
00065     }
00066 
00067 }
